name: behind
posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

example.eg: I hung my coat behind the door.
Alex led, and I followed along behind.
example.egtrans: 亚历克斯带头，我紧随其后。

example.eg: As hard as she tried, she always fell behind the other swimmers in the races.
example.egtrans: 比赛中不管怎样努力，她总是落在其他游泳选手的后面。

example.eg: I knew that behind (= hidden by) her smile was sadness.
example.egtrans: 我知道她在用微笑掩饰着内心的忧伤。

name: behind
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

dsense.name: behind
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: in the place where someone or something was before

example.eg: I was annoyed to discover that I'd left my bag behind.
example.egtrans: 发现自己把包落下了，我很气恼。

example.eg: After the party a few people stayed behind to help clean up.
example.egtrans: 晚会结束后，一些客人留下来帮助收拾打扫。

dsense.name: behind
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: slower or later than someone else, or than you should be

example.eg: The old woman was behind with (= late paying) the rent.

name: behind
posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

trans_examp.trans_en: responsible for or the cause of

example.eg: He wondered what was behind his neighbour's sudden friendliness.
example.egtrans: 他疑惑为何邻居的态度突然友好起来。

example.eg: Marie Curie was the woman behind enormous changes in the science of chemistry.
example.egtrans: 居里夫人使整个化学领域发生了巨变。

name: behind
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the part of the body on which a person sits

example.eg: He tripped and fell on his behind.
example.egtrans: 他绊了一跤，一屁股摔在地上。

example.eg: Why don't you get off your behind (= stand up) and do something!
example.egtrans: 你为何不起来干点儿什么！
